labels.warningMessage: To preserve your rights, we warn you not to transfer your money outside the platform
labels.expiredItem: Your listing has expired, renew now!
labels.youwillDelete: You are about to delete this listing for
labels.productWillBeDeleted: If you proceed, this listing will be deleted and removed from display
labels.addProductsMore: You haven’t added any product for sale yet. Add your products and start selling!
labels.contentParag1: if it’s sold elsewhere or you have decided you don’t want to sell it on Soum
labels.contentParag2: We hide your product temporarly when the listing has expired. You can
labels.Buyer_buy_once: Buyer can buy this product at once. or make a bid starting from

labels.delete_ifSold: Please delete the product when sold elsewhere
labels.delete_auto: Product will be hidden when listing period is over.
labels.can_renew: You can always renew the listing period
labels.tell_use_more: Tell us more about your device
labels.avoid_returning: To avoid returning your device by the buyer, answer all questions with high accuracy
labels.deviceSold: if your device is sold, ship it
labels.deviceSold2: if your device is sold, soum team will contact you to ship it
labels.afterConfirm: After the buyer confirms the device condition, we transfer your money
labels.congratesProduct: Congratulations! your product has been listed successfully
labels.acceptRejectBid: You can know how to accept or reject a bid, delete a product or renew listing.
labels.listedBefore: Please delete the products if it got sold elsewhere.
labels.enterQues: You must at least choose one option
labels.confirm_data: Confirm your information to complete purchase
labels.refundDesc: Once you receive the device, you have 24 hours to give it a test run. If it’s not as the specifications mentioned, return it and get your money back!
labels.grantuee: We guarantee your right if the product does not match
labels.FreeDelivery: Free delivery all over Saudi Arabia
labels.descCond: When we inspect a phone, we award one of these four grades according to the test results:
labels.heavilyUse: Heavily used. 3 or more issues (either with screen, body or functional) Charger, box and headphone may not be included.
labels.newDesc: Looks like new! No issues on the screen, body or functions.Fully functional.Charger, box and headphone may not be included.
labels.veryGoodDes: Light to moderate signs of usage.Device has no more than 2 issues.Charger, box and headphoens may not included.
labels.extensiveDesc: Not functioning well and needs a repair Has major defects or a broken screen/body Charger, box and headphones may not not be included.
labels.summaryListing: Here's a summary of your listing:
labels.HowManyDays: How long would you like your product to be listed in SOUM?
labels.setPrice: Enter a price for your product
labels.expiredDate: Product will be removed automatically after the listing is expired, and it an be renewed afterwards
labels.pleaseDescribe: Please descripe your product and list all remaining defects that weren’t mentioned and accessorise included (if any)
labels.question: Are you listing your product somewhere else?
labels.question_hint: In order to preserve the right of the buyer, you are kindly requested to delete the product from anywhere else before selling it on SOUM. To avoid being subjected to severe penalties that may reach to ban you from the platform.
labels.biddingNote: Note that your bidding price must be lower than the “buy now” price.
labels.biddingInfo: The minimum bidding price is the lowest price at which you can sell the product. Buyers can submit different bids. You can always accept their bid or decline it.
labels.buyerInfo: Buyers can purchase your products right away at a fixed price that you set. No waiting or bidding.Note that your buy now price shouldn’t be higher than the price of the new product.
labels.minimumPictures: Minimum: 4 photos taken from all sides and in high quality
labels.cancelDesc: If you proceed, all your product data that you just entered will be lost.
labels.saveAsDraftDesc: If you proceed, your product will be save as draft.
labels.deleteDesc: If you proceed, all your product data that you just entered will be lost.
labels.howToSellDesc2: Soum will ship your item from your to buyer free of charge!
labels.howToSellDesc3: You will receive your payment once the buyer confirms the receipt
labels.howToSellDesc: List your item in our product page with all it’s details and let other people see it!
labels.see-walkthrough: Let me see how it works!
labels.sell-label: Got some electronics that you don’t need anymore? Let us sell it for you!
labels.sell-desc: List all your unwanted electronic devices and let people bid on it or buy it with a price you define!
labels.save-as-draft-label: You listing draft has been saved successfully!
labels.save-as-draft-desc: Find your draft under My Products tab. You have up to 30 days to complete your listing
labels.no_result_sub: We weren’t able to find any results for your query
labels.PhotoTipText1: Include as many details as possible! People love to see as much details as possible when deciding to purchase.
labels.photoTip1: Include all damages and flaws (if any)
labels.PhotoTipText2: You could also take a photo or a screenshot of your Phone’s Battery Health. You can find your battery health information in your phone settings.
labels.signUp-firstlabel: Buy and sell your items easily in one place!
labels.signUp-firstDes: Browse and buy used items or list and sell your  unwanted items to other users easily and securely!
labels.signUp-secondDes: You can always contact sellers directly if you have any question about the items your purchasing!
labels.signUp-forthlabel: Perfect! Your account has been successfully created!
labels.signUp-forthDes: You can now start completing your profile to start selling your items or you can browse other seller collections!
labels.signUp-thirdDes: You don’t like what you got? Simply return to seller and get your payment back.
labels.deduct: SAR will be deducted from your card. And you won’t be charged the remaining amount unless your offer is accepted by the seller
labels.enterAmount: Please enter an amount that is
labels.bid_valid: Bid will be valid for only 5 days.
labels.expiration_product_date: how much time do you want your product to be on Soum ?
labels.note_expire: Product will be removed automatically after the listing is expired, and can be renewed afterwards
labels.bidPlacedtext: Your bid has been placed successfully! You will get notified once the seller accepts your bid. Meanwhile, you can check your bids status in your
labels.completePayment: waiting for the buyer to complete payment
labels.shuldLoginFirst: To use this feature, you have to sign in first
labels.validCodeDesc: Please do not include any referral promo code information.
labels.validCodeName: Please do not include any referral promo code information.
labels.validName: Please write a name that does not include any personal contact information.
labels.validCode: Please do not include any referral promo code information.
labels.validDesc: Please write a description that does not include any personal contact information.
labels.validComment: Please write a comment that does not include any personal contact information.
labels.mppBanner2: We bring it to you, wherever you are
labels.mppSubBanner2: Free delivery all over the kingdom!
labels.mppSubBanner3: Your money is safe until you try the device!
labels.fast_delivery_text: Will arrive to you in 2 days!
labels.sellingPriceHigherThanMarketPrice: The price that you chose is much higher than the market price of the device

profile.title: Profile

profile.freeShip: will ship the product to buyer for free.
profile.transferAmount: will transfer amount to seller within 24hrs after confirming delivery.
profile.holdDevice: will hold the amount paid until buyer try out the device.
profile.triesProduct: tries out the product and makes sure it matches specifications.

orderDetails.point1: Soum team has sent a request to the delivery partner to pick up your product from the seller
orderDetails.point2: Soum team will share the details of the shipment as soon as it’s picked-up
orderDetails.point3: If the product is not available, Soum team will refund the amount to your account immediately

orderStatus.success_desc: Your order has been placed successfully! We’re currently processing your order and you will get notified once it’s updated.
orderStatus.pending_title: Thanks for submitting your request. It is now being processed
orderStatus.pending_desc: Your payment is now under process. you can track its status through my previous purchases.
orderStatus.fail_desc: We’re sorry! your card was declined and we weren’t able to process your payment. Please contact your card issuer and try again.
orderStatus.mada_fail_desc: Sorry! Please select "mada" payment option in order to be able to complete your purchase successfully.

trackOrder.aggrement: When you receive the product, inspect it and make sure that the product matches the specifications displayed on Soum. In case of any mismatches, raise a dispute by clicking on “dispute” button and Soum team will help you as soon as possible
trackOrder.title: Track Order
trackOrder.autoConfirmed: Product will be auto-confirmed in 24 hrs.
trackOrder.statusForSeller: To ship your order, please print the label and paste it on the delivery box. Please give the delivery agent following CBJ number.
trackOrder.statusForBuyer1: Your package can be tracked using the "Track Shipping" button below. The DHL tracking ID is {{ShipmentIdentificationNumber}}.
trackOrder.statusForBuyer2: Kindly click "Confirm Receiving Product" button once you have received the pakage.
trackOrder.exportLabel: Print Label to paste on consignment
trackOrder.disputeInfo: After receiving your product, you have 24 hours to file a dispute if it doesn’t match it’s specifications
